item.title: The Multi Armed Bandit Problem
item.description: By: Paul Steven Conyngham Reinforcement Learning Terminology Decoded #1: Intro to Reinforcement Learning By: Paul Steven Conyngham #Bandits! Scientists, and machine learning researchers in particular love to give fancy names to things so that no one can understand what they are on about. For someone relatively new to machine learning, “The multi armed bandit problem” sounds like one of these fancy names.
